QuestionJSON.Question: Starshine is beginning a new weightlifting routine. They plan to start by lifting 10 pounds and will increase the weight they lift by 5 pounds each week. They've set a goal to eventually lift 75 pounds. In which week will Starshine reach their weightlifting goal?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: This is a simple looping problem. Starting at 10 pounds, Starshine will add 5 pounds per week. So, 10 (for week 1) + 5*13 (for the next 13 weeks) = 75 pounds, which Starshine will reach during the 14th week.
